p: There was a significant decrease in WBC counts of venom control group compared with normal control rats ( Table 2). The WBCs of groups treated with antivenom and 600 mg/kg of ethanol, ethyl acetate and n-hexane extract partitions were significantly higher compared to venom control rats. The lymphocytes, neutrophils and monocytes counts of venom control rat group were significantly (P˂0.05) lower compared to normal rats.
